description: A nun wandering highlights pun on 'Roman' and 'roaming'.
title: Wandering Nun
n_1: Sister Mary decides to explore Rome.
c1_1: I want to see it all!
n_2: She roams from street to street.
n_3: Brother John finds her at a cafe.
n_4: Back at the convent, they laugh together.
c1_4: I'm a true Roman Catholic now!
